mapper.select: select * from host where name=#{name} and phone=#{phone}
select * from host where name=#{name} and email=#{email}
mapper.insert: insert into host(hno, email, password, name, phone) values(Hseq.nextval, #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone})
mapper.select: select * from host where email = #{email} and password = #{password}
select * from host where email=#{email}
select max(house_no) from house

select h.house_no, h.name, h.tname, h.sname, h.house_date, count(pno)-1 cnt from house h, address a, content c, payfor p where h.hno=#{hno} and h.house_no = a.house_no and h.house_no = c.house_no and h.house_no=p.house_no group by h.house_no, h.name, h.tname, h.sname, h.house_date
select * from house h, address a, content c where h.house_no=#{house_no} and a.house_no = #{house_no} and c.house_no = #{house_no}
select h.house_no house_no, h.name, h.price, a.address, a.detailed, h.photo from house h inner join address a on h.house_no = a.house_no
select * from house h, address a where h.tname = #{tname} and h.house_no = a.house_no
select * from house h, address a where h.sname = #{sname} and h.house_no = a.house_no
select h.house_no house_no, h.name, h.price, a.address, a.detailed, h.photo from house h, address a where h.house_no = #{house_no} and h.house_no = a.house_no

select b.rv_cnt, b.hno, h.* ,rank from (select a.rv_cnt,a.hno,dense_rank() over (order by a.rv_cnt desc) rank from (select count(*) rv_cnt, hou.hno from house hou, payfor p where hou.house_no = p.house_no and p.gno >0 group by hou.hno) a ) b, host h where b.hno = h.hno

select o.adult, o.kid, p.wpay, p.st_no, p.totalPrice, p.gno, o.order_no, o.checkin, o.checkout, g.name gname, g.email, ab.* from order_house o, payfor p , guest g, (select hno, h.house_no, h.tname, h.sname, h.name, a. address, a.detailed from house h, address a where hno=#{hostno} and h.house_no=a.house_no) ab where o.order_no = p.order_no and g.gno = p.gno and o.house_no = ab.house_no and p.house_no = ab.house_no

select o.adult, o.kid, p.totalPrice, g.name as gname, g.email, g.gno, p.pno, hs.name as hsname, o.checkin, o.checkout, ab.* from payfor p, guest g, host hs, order_house o, (select hno, h.house_no, h.tname, h.sname, h.name, a.address, a.detailed from house h, address a where hno=#{hostno} and h.house_no=a.house_no) ab where p.gno = g.gno and p.house_no = ab.house_no and hs.hno=#{hostno} and o.order_no=p.order_no
select t.name as tname, nvl(h.cnt,0) as cnt from (select tname, count(*) as cnt from house group by tname) h right outer join (select name from theme) t on h.tname = t.name order by t.name

select s.name as sname, nvl(h.cnt,0) as cnt from (select sname, count(*) as cnt from house group by sname) h right outer join (select name from subtheme where theme_cate = #{theme}) s on h.sname = s.name
select count(*) as cnt from house where to_char(house_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')

select min(cnt) as cnt from (select house_date, count(*) as cnt from (select trunc(house_date,'dd') as house_date from house where to_char(house_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') between trunc(sysdate,'month') and last_day(sysdate)) group by house_date order by house_date)

select max(cnt) as cnt from (select house_date, count(*) as cnt from (select trunc(house_date,'dd') as house_date from house where to_char(house_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') between trunc(sysdate,'month') and last_day(sysdate)) group by house_date order by house_date)

select d.joindate , nvl(m.cnt,0) as cnt from (select joindate, count(*) as cnt from (select trunc(joindate,'dd') as joindate from host where hno > 0) where joindate between #{date} and last_day(#{date}) group by joindate order by joindate) m right outer join (SELECT TO_DATE(#{date},'YYYY-MM-DD')+(ROWNUM-1) AS joindate FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LAST_DAY(#{date}) - TO_DATE(#{date},'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 >= LEVEL) d on m.joindate = d.joindate order by d.joindate
select count(*) as cnt from host where to_char(joindate,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') and hno > 0
select count(*) as cnt from host where to_char(joindate,'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{yesterday} and hno > 0
